alert.note: Alert for Carroll; Harrison; Tuscarawas (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pittsburgh (Western Pennsylvania and East Central Ohio)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 20 at 8:40PM EDT until August 20 at 9:30PM EDT by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: The National Weather Service in Pittsburgh has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Harrison County in east central Ohio... Western Carroll County in east central Ohio... Tuscarawas County in east central Ohio... * Until 930 PM EDT. * At 840 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over New Philadelphia, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and power lines, resulting in some power outages. * Locations impacted include... New Philadelphia, Dover, Uhrichsville, Carrollton, Dennison, Strasburg, Sugarcreek, Gnadenhutten, Malvern, Tuscarawas, Scio, and Midvale. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Please report severe weather by calling 412-262-1988, posting to the NWS Pittsburgh Facebook page, or using Twitter @NWSPITTSBURGH.
